long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Large PDF Translator - The Efficient PDF Translation Chrome Extension!

Large PDF Translator is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to translate large PDF files quickly and easily. With the ability to process PDFs as long as 2000 pages or 400 MB, this extension provides you with translations to any language in seconds.

Features:

Translate Large PDFs: Select any PDF file and let Large PDF Translator translate the content for you.
Supports 130+ Languages: Translate your PDF to more than 130 languages, including Right-to-Left (RTL) languages.
Preserve Layout & Formatting: Ensure that the original layout and formatting of your PDF are maintained in the translation.
Scanned PDFs (OCR) Supported: Translate scanned PDFs with the integrated OCR technology.
Unlimited Translation: Enjoy unlimited translation capabilities without any limitations.
Read or Download Translations: Access your generated translation within the extension for easy reading or download it for offline use.

Trusted by Professionals:
Large PDF Translator is trusted by a wide range of professionals, including companies, law firms, government agencies, and academic institutions. Our software has been praised for its ability to save time and provide quick translations of large documents.

Privacy and Security:
We prioritize your privacy. Large PDF Translator ensures that your PDFs and translated content remain secure and protected.

Unlimited Translation:
Large PDF Translator offers unlimited translation capabilities. You can translate as many PDFs as you want without any limitations.

Discover Large PDF Translator now and unlock the ability to translate PDFs with ease. Simplify your document analysis and save valuable time. Get started with Large PDF Translator today!
